casebody.data:
John J. PAJOR
v.
ADMINISTRATOR, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION ACT, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2017

Mariusz Kurzyna, in support of the petition.

Richard T. Sponzo, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn. App. 157, 165 A.3d 265 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
